name: Exposing Cult Financial Backers
description: Tracing the financial networks that sustain the International Death Cult’s influence.
focus: Funding Streams for Psychological and Covert Warfare

cards.title: Black Budget and Covert Funding Operations
cards.description: Revealing how clandestine funds finance intelligence and black operations.
bulletpoints: Uncovering the role of classified military budgets in funding control systems.
Exposing the use of shell corporations and offshore accounts.
Tracking how black money is funneled into secret projects and cult-controlled initiatives.

cards.title: Banking Cartels and Centralized Financial Domination
cards.description: Analyzing how international banking institutions enable global elite control.
bulletpoints: Tracing the lineage of private central banking institutions.
Understanding how debt slavery and economic manipulation maintain control.
Investigating financial collapses and engineered crises as power consolidation tools.

cards.title: Corporate and NGO Financial Conduits
cards.description: Examining how ‘philanthropic’ organizations serve as front groups for elite operations.
bulletpoints: Identifying the role of NGOs in money laundering and regime change operations.
Investigating the funding of media, academic institutions, and political movements.
Tracking billionaire-funded influence networks that steer global agendas.
